pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear: long-sleeved shirt and long pants; shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes moderate eye irritation. Harmful if swallowed. Avoid contact with eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes.; Remove contact lenses, if present, after 5 minutes, then continue rinsing eye.; Call poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice.; Have person sip a glass of water if able to swallow.; Do not induce vomiting unless told to do so by a poison control center or doctor.; Do not give anything to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: For medical emergencies involving this product, call toll free 1-888-478-0798.
